main event: Radar detection of two flying objects, one large and one small, over Gardnerville, Nevada, on July 27, 1961.
interesting points: The radar scope indicated two objects maneuvering and giving bright radar returns., The observed shapes were described as round., The color of the objects was noted as white., The duration of the observation was about 2 minutes., The report involved civilian observers, including employees of Wells Cargo Trucking Company.
sighted object: two unidentified flying objects detected by radar
witness description: employees of Wells Cargo Trucking Company and personnel from Anaconda Mining Company
